column4: Hello. I have a question about saving an image from my laptop drive to a USB drive before performing an upgrade from edgy to fiesty.
When initially tried to install Fiesty on my Evo N620c, it misdetected the HD as a SCSI drive, and I had to get a universal boot cd and change fstab. If I do an online
upgrade, will it use the edgy settings and just work as usual or do you folks think I should do a drive image of some sort??
If you specify what..kind of problem, bet someone in here could help
